# Built-in Toolsets

## Plugin Tools

Tools loaded from Python files in `tool_paths`:

```yaml
# .tactus/config.yml
tool_paths:
  - "./tools"
  - "./plugins"
```

Access in procedures:

```lua
Agent "worker" {
    toolsets = {"plugin"}  -- All plugin tools
}
```

## MCP Server Tools

Configure in `.tactus/config.yml`:

```yaml
mcp_servers:
  filesystem:
    command: "npx"
    args: ["-y", "@modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem", "/workspace"]

  custom:
    command: "python"
    args: ["-m", "my_mcp_server"]
    env:
      API_KEY: "${API_KEY}"
```

Tools are namespaced by server:

```lua
Agent "worker" {
    toolsets = {
        "filesystem_read_file",
        "filesystem_write_file",
        "custom_my_tool"
    }
}
```

## Combining Toolsets

```lua
-- Multiple toolsets
Agent "worker" {
    toolsets = {"plugin", "done", "custom_tools"}
}

-- Inline tools in agent
Agent "worker" {
    tools = {
        {
            name = "inline_tool",
            description = "Defined inline",
            parameters = {...},
            handler = function(args) ... end
        }
    },
    toolsets = {"done"}
}
```
